views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 - 12

Haptic Scroll tweak will provide haptic feedback when UI scroll limit is reached.
It's applicable system-wide and it has an option to be disabled in selected applications.

Configure options from Settings.

Added A12 support. Added haptic feedback on Face ID authentication (iPhone X only)


Added iOS 11 support. Added iPhone7-like haptic feedback for:
- Switch toggling
- Notification Center show/dismiss
- Spotlight search (while in app) show/dismiss
- Slider min/max value reached
- Date Picker value change
- Table View Section Index change (Contacts app for example)
Fixed AirPort issue.
Added haptic feedback for showing/dismissing Control Center.

Added native Haptic Engine support.

Fixed incompatibility with some apps.
